data.name: Molten Oculus
data.tooltip:
Increases life regeneration by <d ref="duckiesItemsGoldDamageOrb_Buff.modifiers[0].amount" style="Bold"/>.

Enemies killed by weapon attack burst into a pool of magma, igniting the land for <d ref="duckiesItemsGoldDamageOrb_LavaPoolPersistent.periodic.durations[0] * duckiesItemsGoldDamageOrb_LavaPoolPersistent.periodic.count" style="Bold"/> seconds. Ground enemies that pass ignited area take <d ref="duckiesItemsGoldDamageOrb_LavaDamageRadius.amount / duckiesItemsGoldDamageOrb_LavaPoolPersistent.periodic.durations[0]" style="Bold"/> damage per second.

<UnitName>Unique effect, doesn't stack.</>
